WAs I said I would never use my magic to harm another my coven would be pis=
sed. And yes I could harm you but I don't wont to. And I ask your forgivene=
ss."???

From: Legendarynemasis@...
Sent: =
Sunday, September 08, 2002 7:06 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: =
HA HA

     Yesss... my mail box gets cluttered for nonsense such as this. =
Now then all shut and listen as the great Qs7 speaks. Ellen, stop spamming =
and acting like you control the damn RPG. number 1, thats been done by me a=
nd several others before to varying degrees except I pointed out rules bein=
g broken, please dont be a copycat and be original.  

Now then as for this=
 who christ delivering so and so blah blah blah, lay off the religious stuf=
f in the RPG. Me I believe theres a god, do I go to church? No. Call me hea=
then, call me a blasphemer, call me an asshole, call me whatever you want b=
ut the fact of the matter is I believe that if you believe there is some hi=
gher form of being, your good. Now then... onto this whole Witch craft thin=
g. Not everything in witch craft is related to the devil, so don't start as=
sociating it with the prince of darkness himself. No I don't practice it, h=
owever I do know some people who were heavily into it and Ellen unless you =
are a newbie or just plain stupid, you will know of the Rule of three. Whic=
h means if you cast a spell on a person for no good reason it will come bac=
k on you three times worse. And believe me, I know someone who has had expe=
rience with that. If you want to try and spread fear around threatening wit=
chcraft on people, more power to you. Just try to remember these threats te=
nd to be out dated by the time you turn 13, whenever that is.  

Ah and yes=
s.. No threatening people over the RPG mail string or over email in general=
, because #1 even if you say you are into witch craft, im guessing about um=
m almost everyone doesnt believe you. #2 Its email, how can you threaten a =
person through email? "Oh Im gonna kick your ass!" Yeah sure,  come on down=
 to the east coast spend a thousand a dollars or so and show up at my door =
with a bat and then MAYBE i'll take you seriously, or I might just think yo=
ur a delusional psycho and have your ass shot by either cop that lives abou=
t 2 seconds from my house with a walk. Just as a note, I live in NJ so if y=
ou lvie there, come on down I got nothing better to do.  

Now then, with t=
his mail I would appreciate the mass mailings of this debate to stop, but I=
 know they wont and this post will generate a mass amount of flames and mor=
e debate as well as idle threats. But ah well, its my job and damn it, I lo=
ve it.  

~Qs7, LN, Alex, Chaos, Whatever- Whee! JUME! and more Whee!
